amendatorysection.chaptername: Monopolies and Unlawful Restraint of Trade
amendatorysection.para: (1) Cigarettes has the same meaning as in section 77-2601;
(2) Package has the same meaning as in 15 U.S.C. 1332(4), as such section existed on May 1, 2001; and
(3) Person has the same meaning as in section 77-2601.
